Posts.Content: Mar 13, 2017 02:36PM Amandab1234 wrote: 11 days post unx. I'm doing pretty well. Was completely off pain pills by the week after. Today Is the first day without even over the counter medicine. Had my drain out 8th day which helped decrease the muscle spasms tremendously. Now feel like I have a huge sunburn on my front and around the back and when I move it hurts. But the pain is manageable and mostly annoying, like a sunburn. Still need to take it easy and not do to much. Did absolutely no house work the first week and just sat in a recliner. I'm only 40 and somewhat fit. Can't wait to get moving again. Have to do radiation and will find out about chemo on 23rd. Waiting on the mammaprint test. Hope everyone else is recovery well.
